title: Coin Collecting Robot
description: A robot that can find and collect coins, as well as draw.
fullDescription: This robot was part of my ELEC 291 design studio at UBC. As a team, we designed a microcontroller based robot that could detect coins using a metal detector, detect AC current sources (wires), and pick up coins using an electromagnet. Additionally, the robot was outfitted with a pen to draw text. I focused on the module level design and testing of the various sensors and manipulators present on the robot.
